competitors.name: Adidas
competitors.market_position: Key global competitor to Nike with significant presence in sportswear and fashion; experienced declining growth in China but remains a major player.

competitors.name: Anta
competitors.market_position: Leading Chinese sportswear brand benefiting from the 'Guochao' trend, rapidly growing and expanding globally posing significant threat to Nike in China and beyond.

competitors.name: Li-Ning
competitors.market_position: Major Chinese sportswear firm leveraging nationalistic sentiments among Gen Z; growing quickly in China and internationally, competing strongly with Nike.

competitors.name: Salomon
competitors.market_position: Chinese-owned brand growing in the sportswear segment, mentioned alongside Anta and Li-Ning; less prominent but considered a challenger brand.

competitors.name: Asics
competitors.market_position: Recognized international brand competing with Nike primarily in footwear and running shoes.

competitors.name: Puma
competitors.market_position: Global sportswear and footwear brand competing with Nike in the same segments, focusing on lifestyle and fashion markets.

competitors.name: Under Armour
competitors.market_position: Athletic apparel and footwear brand competing with Nike, more niche in apparel but relevant in sports markets.

competitors.name: Fila
competitors.market_position: Activewear and footwear brand competing within the same market segments, focused on fashion and casual sportswear.

competitors.name: New Balance
competitors.market_position: Well-known footwear and apparel brand competing in running and lifestyle segments against Nike.

competitors.name: Skechers
competitors.market_position: Global footwear brand with a strong presence in casual and sports-inspired shoes, a competitor in the broader footwear market.

competitors.name: Lululemon
competitors.market_position: Competitor primarily in athletic apparel, especially yoga and lifestyle segments, increasingly relevant in the premium activewear market.

competitors.name: Athletica
competitors.market_position: Athletic apparel brand competing with Nike in the apparel segment; smaller scale compared to global players.

competitors.name: VF Corporation
competitors.market_position: Parent company of multiple apparel and footwear brands competing indirectly with Nike in the sportswear and lifestyle categories.
